bibl.title: Letter from Wilburt C. Davison to Emilie Lawrence Reed, March 16, 1931

div1.p: Davison is disappointed that Emilie Lawrence Reed cannot attend the dedication of Duke University Hospital.

div1.head: Letter from Wilburt C. Davison to Emilie Lawrence Reed, March 16, 1931
div1.opener:
Duke University
DURHAM
NORTH CAROLINA
March 16, 1931.
School of Medicine
Office of the Dean
Please Reply to Undersigned
Box 3701
Dear Mrs. Reed:
div1.p:
We are all very disappointed that you
cannot be with us on April 20th at the time of the
Dedication of the Medical School and Hospital. I
hope that your daughter will be able to come. I
am also sending invitations to others of yours and
Dr. Reed's relatives.

Hoping that you will be able to visit
this new institution of which we are very proud
at some other time, I am
